title: America’s Great Depression section III
author: VD
content_html:
I have to admit that I’m impressed at how people are hanging a tougher this time despite the apparent increased level of difficulty when compared with the scores of the first Voxiversity. 250 people took the second quiz, a dropoff of only thirty percent from the original 357 opposed to the 50 percent decline last time. However, we’re starting to get into the particulars now so I wouldn’t be surprised if it becomes somewhat more difficult for those who have been skimming over the material or are coasting on their previous knowledge of Austrian theory.

UPDATE – Chapter III “Some Alternative Explanations for Depression: A Critique” for next Saturday.
content_text:
I have to admit that I’m impressed at how people are hanging a tougher this time despite the apparent increased level of difficulty when compared with the scores of the first Voxiversity.  250 people took the second quiz, a dropoff of only thirty percent from the original 357 opposed to the 50 percent decline last time.  However, we’re starting to get into the particulars now so I wouldn’t be surprised if it becomes somewhat more difficult for those who have been skimming over the material or are coasting on their previous knowledge of Austrian theory.
UPDATE – Chapter III “Some Alternative Explanations for Depression: A Critique” for next Saturday.
